description:
When the pace is intense, stay relaxed and focused with these light and loose RUN EASY pants for men. Combining ultra-soft skinfeel and excellent moisture management in a cut that's optimised for freedom of movement, these versatile modern joggers are perfect for all-season, all-purpose training duty. The technical French terry fabric is super soft against the skin, delivers great moisture management and won't slow your stride. Add an adjustable waistband, practical hand pockets and reflective detailing, and the RUN EASY pants from ODLO maximise comfort and put the fun back into your run.
Why they made it: Trail Running, Out/Living, Running, Training
name: Odlo Run Easy 365 Pants - Mens
